author: vsiveton
msg: MJAVADOC-87: doc-files ignored if they reside in the resources directory
o added a Javadoc resource directory (for package.html, images...)

author: jm
msg: memory leak in long-running scan processes using the URIBL rules; their callback closures were not being deleted after each message was scanned.  Fixed, and fixed in such a way that plugins don't have to worry about those; they'll just be cleaned up by Mail::SpamAssassin::PerMsgStatus::check()
